title: "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region"
body:
My main account is the account that I cannot log into. It still exists, I can look up its information but I cannot log into it.

How do I go about resolving this problem exactly? I can't submit a formal ticket to the site as this is my side account created during that time where LoL crashed repeatedly for no reason due to server issues and my main account got banned.
There's also the issue that I cannot remember my email address used for my main account at all. Not even a little bit. 

Please help. Thank you.

replies.body:
You can actually submit an [**account recovery ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) for assistance with this. Since you can't log into the account, your communications with our recovery team will be entirely through email, but you can get assistance this way.

Please let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket.

I have same issue, but cant send request, seems to be invalid Captcha configuration, Checked in inspector. (Google Chrome build  61.0.3163.100 x64, windows 10 pro x64)
Uncaught Error: ReCAPTCHA placeholder element must be empty
    at or (recaptcha__en.js:373)
    at recaptcha__en.js:378
    at ar (recaptcha__en.js:368)
    at recaptcha__en.js:377
    at recaptcha__en.js:388

I wanna make the steps to unlock (unchained alistar) skin......the first step : i must go to (league of legends support) and send a message to riot games .... and when i wanna send a message they says (you must sign in then we will give you the permision to send the message and when i sign in..... they says (Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region) and i dont know what i should do..... and the second step : i must go to the youtube and subscribe the page and they will unlock the skin for me and this is the problem...... the second step is easy but the first step is the hard......

And thanks

xXBossMan
